main event: Two green lights were seen over a large area in Worcester, Massachusetts, on November 12, 1954, indicating a meteor.
interesting points: The lights were seen twenty minutes apart., The observation type was Ground-Visual., The lights appeared to be two objects but were believed to be one due to canopy distortion., The sighting was reported by a pilot from Mohawk Airlines flight 56., The objects were described as enormous and appeared to be heading towards the Earth.
